name: Pantheon
description: Greek Mythology meets a kind of Wizard of Oz theme in this turn-based, top-down RPG.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD A6-3650 APU with Radeon(tm) HD Graphics 2.60 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD A6-3650 APU with Radeon(tm) HD Graphics 2.60 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
